entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is introduced as someone who is not listening and is opening the cabin door.

entities.name: ni ght
entities.description: The night is mentioned as where Hagrid is striding off to.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as someone who is following Hagrid.

entities.name: beauxbatons carriage
entities.description: The Beauxbatons carriage is mentioned as where Hagrid is leading Harry to.

entities.name: madame maxime
entities.description: Madame Maxime is introduced as someone who opens the door bearing the crossed golden wands.

relationships.description: Hagrid is leading Harry to the night.
Harry is being led by Hagrid to the Beauxbatons carriage.
Hagrid knocks on the door of Madame Maxime.
